ki
Master’s Bathroom

ELECTROLUX Rendering and Design
This concept has 3 zones :
1. Cooking and Preparation Area : Overall look is clean and cozy. The color changing LED lights cre- ate a flexible color solution that carters the taste of the entire family. Lighting color changes dynamically based on the status of the food being cooked.
2. Family Messaging Area : The interactive and scribble capable monitor serves as an electronic messaging center / white board.
3. Entertainment & Lounge Area : Large LED monitor and video glass projection create an enjoyable experience for the family.
Design property of Albert Chan . Copyright 2013. All rights Reserved | Designed by Albert Chan albertgochan@yahoo.com
